page.title: 12JOURNEY TO SCHOOL FROM HOOK
page.content: I come to school on a terrible bus.It belongs to Newnham Coaches but we call them'Bones Boneshakers'because Mr Bone is the owner.There are 3 coaches-one is a continental but like the rest is really dilapidated. Jane,Sara and I get on at Holt Lane-if it's raining we're unlucky as the roof leaks and lots of the seats get wet.We talk a lot,mostly about school and our best friends.Everyone thinks it's unfair we have to pay Â£2 a week because we are just under 3 miles from Robert May's. There is no refund even if there are strikes or day's off.Top speed is snail's pace-it's quicker to walk up Dunley's Hill- so the short journey takes about 15minutes.Mr Bone shouts a lot both at back seat 5th years and at the engine to go faster.If we did get a lovely new bus it wouldn't be the same.We always get there in the end.
